help_administration_password.lang_hap1: Note: After you have made your changes, click Save Settings to apply your changes.
help_administration_password.lang_hap5: To ensure the Router's security, this password protects access to the Router's browser-based utility. Enter a new password.
help_administration_password.lang_hap7: Enter the password again to confirm.
help_administration_password.lang_hap8: Note: For more information, refer to the online User Guide at www.linksys.com.
